[Orc Fighter Class Transfer]:
An Orc Fighter who has reached level 20 may change their class to an Orc Raider or an Orc Monk. A character may undertake the class transfer quest at level 18; if successful, they will be able to use more specialized and powerful skills than before. In order to become an Orc Raider, you must first meet Prefect Karukia, and in order to become an Orc Monk, you must first meet Gantaki Zu Urutu. They can both be found in the Orc Village. Think carefully about which class you want to select, then seek out the appropriate NPC.
Close Window.
